validationReport.statement: PDF file is not compliant with Validation Profile requirements.

rule.description: The PDF/UA version and conformance level of a file shall be specified using the PDF/UA Identification extension schema

check.errorMessage: The document metadata stream doesn't contain PDF/UA Identification Schema

rule.description: If the FontDescriptor dictionary of an embedded CID font contains a CIDSet stream, then it shall identify all CIDs which are present in the font program, regardless of whether a CID in the font is referenced or used by the PDF or not
rule.test: containsFontFile == false || fontName.search(/[A-Z]{6}\+/) != 0 || containsCIDSet == false || cidSetListsAllGlyphs == true

check.errorMessage: A CIDSet entry in the Font descriptor does not correctly identify all glyphs present in the embedded font subset
A CIDSet entry in the Font descriptor does not correctly identify all glyphs present in the embedded font subset
A CIDSet entry in the Font descriptor does not correctly identify all glyphs present in the embedded font subset

rule.description: Figure tags shall include an alternative representation or replacement text that represents the contents marked with the Figure tag as noted in ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.7.2, Table 323

check.context: root/document[0]/StructTreeRoot[0](102 0 obj PDStructTreeRoot)/K[0](104 0 obj SEDocument Document)/K[0](180 0 obj SEArt Article)/K[3](183 0 obj SEFigure Figure)
check.errorMessage: Figure structure element neither has an alternate description nor a replacement text

check.context: root/document[0]/StructTreeRoot[0](102 0 obj PDStructTreeRoot)/K[0](104 0 obj SEDocument Document)/K[0](180 0 obj SEArt Article)/K[4](184 0 obj SEFigure Figure)
check.errorMessage: Figure structure element neither has an alternate description nor a replacement text

check.errorMessage: Figure structure element neither has an alternate description nor a replacement text

check.context: root/document[0]/StructTreeRoot[0](102 0 obj PDStructTreeRoot)/K[0](104 0 obj SEDocument Document)/K[0](180 0 obj SEArt Article)/K[6](186 0 obj SEFigure Figure)
check.errorMessage: Figure structure element neither has an alternate description nor a replacement text

check.context: root/document[0]/StructTreeRoot[0](102 0 obj PDStructTreeRoot)/K[0](104 0 obj SEDocument Document)/K[0](180 0 obj SEArt Article)/K[7](187 0 obj SEFigure Figure)
check.errorMessage: Figure structure element neither has an alternate description nor a replacement text

rule.description: Content shall be marked as Artifact or tagged as real content

check.errorMessage: Content is neither marked as Artifact nor tagged as real content
Content is neither marked as Artifact nor tagged as real content
Content is neither marked as Artifact nor tagged as real content
